name: Uphill (FunnyLucky)
description:
This was my very first time making something that resembles a game. I made it in Stencyl, and for some reason using Flash.

After finishing this game and uploading it to Kongregate, my harddrive corrupted and I lost all the data. The only thing I have left of this game is the SWF file, so why not upload it here as well? This is why you need backups. ALWAYS.

Disabled donations because a) it is a bad game; b) literally can't enable them

WARNING: For some reason, after 30 seconds of you existing, the game starts to lag horribly. Just die to stop that. It seems at though the massive lag happens only on my computer. More reasons to put it online!

In any case, if you're reading this - thank you! I hope you enjoyed Uphill. Drop a comment or review, or both!
